claim: Karl Malone is nicknamed The Mailman, given to him by his teammates.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Karl Anthony Malone  (  born July 24 , 1963  )  is an American retired professional basketball player .

claim: Karl Malone is nicknamed The Mailman, given to him by his teammates.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Nicknamed `` The Mailman '' , Malone played the power forward position and spent his first 18 seasons  (  1985 -- 2003  )  in the National Basketball Association  (  NBA  )  with the Utah Jazz and formed a formidable duo with his teammate John Stockton .
